data.name: powered_by_gone
data.marketing: Removes the powered by Jomres link from the bottom of the page.
data.description: Removes the powered by Jomres link from the bottom of the page.
data.change_log: 1.1 added code to watch jquery and change the cursor to the waiting cursor when ajax activity takes place. 1.2 Updated to work with Jr7, including using new poweredby template. v1.3 PHP7 related maintenance.
data.author: Vince Wooll
